com.skobbler.ngx.navigation
Class SKNavigationManager

java.lang.Object
  com.skobbler.ngx.navigation.SKNavigationManager

public final class SKNavigationManager
extends java.lang.Object

Class which handles all the navigation methods.

Version:
3.0

stopNavigation

public void stopNavigation()

getNavigationMode

public int getNavigationMode()
Returns if a navigation has been started.

Returns:
the code for one of the 3 modes if a navigation is started, 0 otherwise

blockRoad

public void blockRoad(double distance)
Blocks the road at a given distance. Blocking the road will trigger a rerouting.

Parameters:
distance - - the distance to the block from the current position or from the start point. The distance in given in meters.

unblockAllRoads

public void unblockAllRoads()
Unblocks all previously blocked roads and causes a rerouting.

increaseSimulationSpeed

public void increaseSimulationSpeed(int value)
Increases the route simulation speed. Makes sense only if the positioner in use is #SIMULATION.

Parameters:
value - the value to add to the current speed, in meters per second

decreaseSimulationSpeed

public void decreaseSimulationSpeed(int value)
Decreases the route simulation speed. Makes sense only if the positioner in use is #SIMULATION.

Parameters:
value - the value to subtract from the current speed, in meters per second

formatDistance

public java.lang.String formatDistance(int distanceInMeters)
Returns the formatted distance based on the distance unit set.

Parameters:
distanceInMeters -
Returns:
string containing the formatted distance .

getCurrentSpeed

public double getCurrentSpeed()
Returns the current estimated speed.

Returns:
m/s value

giveSpeedLimitAudioInfo

public void giveSpeedLimitAudioInfo()
When called, the current speed limit audio info will be provided in SKNavigationListener.onSignalNewAdviceWithAudioFiles(String[], boolean) if advises are played with mp3 sound files or SKNavigationListener.onSignalNewAdviceWithInstruction(String) if text to speech is enabled .

setMapNavigationPan

public void setMapNavigationPan(float deltaVerticalPanning,
                                float deltaHorizontalPanning)
Sets the position of the current position in navigation mode (2D) .

Parameters:
deltaVerticalPanning - deltaVerticalPanning values are betweeen -0.5 and 0.5 . If 0 then the CCP is placed in the middle of the screen (vertical).
deltaHorizontalPanning - deltaHorizontalPanning values are betweeen -0.5 and 0.5 . If 0 then the CCP is placed in the middle of the screen (horizontal).

renderVisualAdviceImage

public boolean renderVisualAdviceImage(SKCrossingDescriptor descriptor,
                                       java.lang.String filePath,
                                       SKVisualAdviceColor colors)
Creates a visual image file using the crossing descriptor and some colors.

Parameters:
descriptor - descriptor of the crossing
filePath - path to the file that will contain the rendered image
colors - colors for visual advice
Returns:
true if the image was created, false otherwise.
